attributes.action: Put an end to price hikes for goods and services at motorway service stations.
attributes.additional_details: There is no justifiable reason for charging extra as they all sit on the motorway and A roads, It should be cheaper to provide these goods and services as it is easier to receive deliveries.
attributes.background: With todays fair competition laws it is unfair for service stations to charge extra for fuel and services just because they have a monopoly,

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. We're not sure what regulations you'd like to be applied to the motorway service station industry. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
